summary: An email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to other attorneys on the Ghislaine Maxwell case, forwarding a courtesy copy of a court filing regarding juror name disclosure and providing updated contact information. This is routine legal correspondence in the ongoing criminal proceedings.

events.title: Filing Regarding Juror Disclosure
events.description: A court filing is made in the case U.S. v. Maxwell regarding the disclosure of juror names to counsel only upon completion of a questionnaire.

keyFacts: The document is an email from Bobbi C. Sternheim, an attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, dated November 3, 2021.
The email forwards a courtesy copy of a court filing related to juror name disclosure procedures in the criminal case U.S. v. Maxwell.
The email provides Sternheim's updated office address and preferred email address.
The correspondence is marked as potentially confidential/privileged attorney communication.
The case referenced is S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN), indicating it is the second superseding indictment in the ongoing prosecution.
